list.name: user_filter
list.label: 👤 Фильтр по пользователям
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT sl.end_user as user_alias FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl WHERE sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI' AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL AND sl.end_user != '' ORDER BY user_alias

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  SUM(sl.spend) as total_spend
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''

SELECT
  COUNT(*) as total_requests
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''

SELECT
  SUM(sl.prompt_tokens) as prompt_tokens
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''

SELECT
  SUM(sl.completion_tokens) as completion_tokens
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''

SELECT
  ROUND((SUM(sl.prompt_tokens)::numeric / NULLIF(SUM(sl.completion_tokens), 0))::numeric, 2) as token_ratio
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''

SELECT
  ROUND((SUM(sl.prompt_tokens + sl.completion_tokens)::numeric / NULLIF(SUM(sl.spend), 0))::numeric, 0) as tokens_per_dollar
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''

SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  'prompt' as metric,
  SUM(sl.prompt_tokens) as value
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''
UNION ALL
SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  'completion' as metric,
  SUM(sl.completion_tokens) as value
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''

SELECT
  date_trunc('hour', sl."startTime") as time,
  'Почасовые расходы' as metric,
  SUM(sl.spend) as value
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''
GROUP BY date_trunc('hour', sl."startTime")
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  ROUND((SUM(sl.spend) / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT DATE(sl."startTime")), 0) * 30)::numeric, 0) as monthly_forecast
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''

panels.title: 🏆 Топ пользователей по расходам (Нажмите на имя для детализации)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COALESCE(sl.end_user, 'unknown') as "👤 Пользователь",
  ROUND(SUM(sl.spend)::numeric, 2) as "💰 Общие расходы",
  ROUND((SUM(sl.spend) / SUM(SUM(sl.spend)) OVER())::numeric, 3) as "📈 % от общих",
  COUNT(*) as "📊 Всего запросов",
  SUM(sl.prompt_tokens + sl.completion_tokens) as "🔢 Всего токенов",
  SUM(sl.prompt_tokens) as "⬇️ Входные токены",
  SUM(sl.completion_tokens) as "⬆️ Выходные токены",
  ROUND((SUM(sl.prompt_tokens)::numeric / NULLIF(SUM(sl.completion_tokens), 0))::numeric, 2) as "⚖️ In/Out",
  ROUND((SUM(sl.prompt_tokens + sl.completion_tokens)::numeric / NULLIF(SUM(sl.spend), 0))::numeric, 0) as "⚡ Токены за $",
  ROUND((SUM(sl.spend) / NULLIF(COUNT(*), 0))::numeric, 4) as "💵 Стоимость за запрос"
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''
GROUP BY sl.end_user
HAVING SUM(sl.spend) > 0
ORDER BY "💰 Общие расходы" DESC

SELECT
  sl.end_user as "end_user_alias",
  sl.model,
  SUM(sl.spend) as "Value"
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''
GROUP BY sl.end_user, sl.model
HAVING SUM(sl.spend) > 0
ORDER BY "Value" DESC

SELECT
  sl.end_user as "end_user_alias",
  sl.model,
  SUM(sl.prompt_tokens + sl.completion_tokens) as "Value"
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''
GROUP BY sl.end_user, sl.model
HAVING SUM(sl.prompt_tokens + sl.completion_tokens) > 0
ORDER BY "Value" DESC

SELECT
  sl.end_user as "end_user_alias",
  sl.model,
  COUNT(*) as "Value"
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''
GROUP BY sl.end_user, sl.model
HAVING COUNT(*) > 0
ORDER BY "Value" DESC

SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  sl.model as metric,
  SUM(sl.spend) as value
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''
GROUP BY sl.model
HAVING SUM(sl.spend) > 0
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 8

SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  sl.model as metric,
  COUNT(*) as value
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''
GROUP BY sl.model
HAVING COUNT(*) > 0
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 8

SELECT
  NOW() as time,
  sl.model as metric,
  SUM(sl.prompt_tokens + sl.completion_tokens) as value
FROM "LiteLLM_SpendLogs" sl
WHERE
  sl."startTime" >= $__timeFrom()
  AND sl."startTime" < $__timeTo()
  AND sl.metadata->>'user_api_key_team_alias' = 'OpenWebUI'
  AND (sl.end_user ~ '$user_filter' OR '$user_filter' = '.*')
  AND sl.end_user IS NOT NULL
  AND sl.end_user != ''
GROUP BY sl.model
HAVING SUM(sl.prompt_tokens + sl.completion_tokens) > 0
ORDER BY value DESC
LIMIT 8
